title: 3D Virtual World-Based Advanced STEM Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and experimental methods, experience with digital learning environments
context.additional_context: Science field employment-linked program at vocational training institutions, utilizing virtual world platforms (e.g., Minecraft Education).

learning_goals: Simulate physical/chemical phenomena in a 3D virtual world to explain scientific principles with 80% accuracy.
Collaborate with peer learners using virtual collaboration tools to complete three or more STEM projects.
Create two or more visualizations of scientific concepts using 3D modeling tools.
Analyze virtual experimental data to write a report solving real-life problems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
